derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English ryge, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch rogge and German Roggen

encyclopedia.content: 英文单词 名词 n. 音标：[rai] 1. 裸麦，黑麦[U] The farm grows wheat and rye. 这个农场种植小麦和黑麦。 2. 黑麦威士忌酒[U][C] 3. 裸麦面包，黑面包[U] 4. 吉卜赛绅士；吉卜赛男子[C] 黑麦威士忌的简称 黑麦威士忌（Rye Whisky），也称裸麦威士忌，是用不得少于51%的黑麦及其它谷物酿制而成的，酒液呈琥珀色，味道与波旁威士忌不同，具有较为浓郁的口感，因此不太受现代人的喜爱。 主要品牌有： ①Old Overholt 老奥弗霍尔德

entry.def: Rye is a cereal grown in cold countries. Its grains can be used to make flour, bread, or other foods.

example.ex: One of the first crops that I grew when we came here was rye.
example.tran: 我们来到这里时，我种的第一批作物里就有黑麦。

entry.def: Rye is bread made from rye.

example.ex: I was eating ham and Swiss cheese on rye.
example.tran: 我正吃夹火腿和瑞士干酪的黑麦面包。

means.word_mean: 1. the seed of the cereal grass
2. hardy annual cereal grass widely cultivated in northern Europe where its grain is the chief ingredient of black bread and in North America for forage and soil improvement
3. whiskey distilled from rye or rye and malt

sentences.en: Rye is tolerant of poor,acid soils.
sentences.cn: 黑麦耐贫瘠的酸性的土壤。

sentences.en: Rye has many advantages as a winter-sown crop.
sentences.cn: 黑麦作为冬季作物有许多优点。

sentences.en: The best-known grains are wheat,barley,oats,rye and maize.
sentences.cn: 最为人们所熟知的粮食是小麦、大麦、燕麦、黑麦和玉米。

sentences.en: By cereals we mean wheat,oats,rye,barley,and all that.
sentences.cn: 谈到谷物,我们指的是小麦、燕麦、黑麦、大麦之类的东西。
